title: A newe ballade of a louer/ extolling his ladye. To the tune of Damon and Pithias.
author: Osborne, M., fl. 1568.
publisher: In Fletestrete at the signe of the Faucon, by Wylliam Gryffith,
notes: Verse: "Alas my harte doth boyle, and burne with in my breste: to showe to thee myne ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
